channel.title: How do I create objects?
channel.description:
How do I create or delete objects??? I'm a noob at this, and I've already looked through tutorials and search...
Please help me! :(

item.title: How do I create objects?
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

-.- what meanies some people are… Anyways, heres what you do.

in your client notepad (or client.java,) search this up:

makeGlobalObject you should get something like this makeGlobalObject(2613, 3102, 1306, -1, 10); // Magic tree the 2613 is the X co-ordinates. 3102 is the Y co-ordinates. 1306 is the item code. -1 is the way it’s facing. leave the 10 alone and the Magic is what it’s called. Hope it helped.

Read full topic
